item.title: 富国银行首席执行官称银行没有收购压力
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo）首席执行官查理-沙尔夫（Charlie Scharf）周三表示，在监管机构取消了对这家美国第四大银行长达七年的处罚，给予其更大的扩张自由之后，该银行并没有面临进行收购以促进增长的压力。【原文：Wells Fargo CEO Charlie Scharf said on Wednesday the lender is not under pressure to make acquisitions to boost growth, after regulators lifted a seven-year penalty that gives the fourth-largest U.S. lender more freedom to expand.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，苹果将使用谷歌的人工智能模型运行新款 Siri
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三报道，苹果公司计划使用谷歌开发的 1.2 万亿参数的人工智能模型来帮助全面改进 Siri 语音助手。【原文：Apple plans to use a 1.2 trillion parameter artificial intelligence model developed by Google to help power an overhaul of the Siri voice assistant, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国贸易监管机构对诺和诺德竞购美特斯邦威表示担忧
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会在周三致函两家公司的法律团队时表示，如果诺和诺德以 100 亿美元竞购肥胖症药物开发商美塞拉公司（Metsera），而两家公司未经事先监管审查就完成交易，其交易结构可能会违反美国反垄断法的规定。【原文：The structure of Novo Nordisk's $10 billion bid for obesity drug developer Metsera may violate provisions of U.S. antitrust law if the companies consummate the deal without prior regulatory review, the U.S. Federal Trade Commission said in a Wednesday letter to the companies' legal teams.】

item.title: 美国银行首席执行官称公司可能考虑在支付领域进行收购
item.description: 美国银行首席执行官布莱恩-莫伊尼汉（Brian Moynihan）周三表示，美国银行可能会考虑在美国收购更多支付业务，但该行不会考虑海外市场的交易。【原文：Bank of America could consider acquiring more payment businesses in the United States, but the bank is not looking at deals in overseas markets, CEO Brian Moynihan said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Netflix 采用新的观众衡量标准，全球广告观众达 1.9 亿人次
item.description: Netflix 周三表示，其平台上的广告已覆盖全球超过 1.9 亿月活跃观众（MAVs）。【原文：Netflix said on Wednesday that ads on its platform have reached over 190 million monthly active viewers (MAVs) globally, as the streaming giant instituted the new metric to measure its ad reach in terms of people instead of accounts.】

item.title: 贸易组织称，美国航空公司看到了停航对乘客预订的影响
item.description: 代表美国主要航空公司的一个行业组织的负责人周三告诉路透社记者，随着政府关门在周三达到创纪录的第36天，航空公司的乘客预订量开始下降。【原文：The head of a trade group representing major U.S. airlines told Reuters on Wednesday carriers are beginning to see a drop-off in passenger bookings as a government shutdown hit a record 36th day on Wednesday.】

item.title: UPS 航空枢纽关闭导致全球网络送货延迟
item.description: 美国联合包裹服务公司位于肯塔基州路易斯维尔的大型航空货运枢纽在发生致命空难后暂时关闭，这将导致该快递公司的全球网络出现延误。【原文：The temporary closure of the sprawling United Parcel Service air cargo hub in Louisville, Kentucky, following a deadly plane crash will create delays through the delivery firm's global network.】

item.title: 据哥伦比亚广播公司报道，特朗普和礼来公司将于周四宣布减肥药降价
item.description: 据哥伦比亚广播公司周三援引消息人士的话报道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四将宣布与礼来公司和诺和诺德公司的官员达成一项协议，在某些情况下将减肥药的价格降至每月150美元。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Thursday is expected to announce a deal with officials from Eli Lilly and Novo Nordisk cutting the price of weight loss drugs in some cases to $150 a month, CBS reported on Wednesday, citing sources.】

item.title: 福利停滞不前，美国家庭求助于食品银行和亲戚
item.description: 当马里兰州蒙哥马利县的 Daletia Chung 得知她 11 月份的食品补助将被延迟发放时，她立即与大家庭制定了一个计划，共同进餐和购买日用品，以保证自己和孩子的温饱。【原文：When Daletia Chung, of Montgomery County, Maryland, learned that her November food benefits would be delayed, she immediately made a plan with extended family to share meals and groceries so she could keep herself and her child fed.】

item.title: 美国电影协会要求 Meta 取消 Instagram 青少年滤镜上的 PG-13 标签
item.description: 美国电影协会（Motion Picture Association）已向 Meta 公司发出了一封禁止令，反对该社交媒体平台在 Instagram 上针对 18 岁以下用户使用受 PG-13 电影分级系统启发的滤镜进行内容审核。【原文：The Motion Picture Association has sent a cease-and-desist letter to Meta , objecting to the social media platform's use of filters inspired by the PG-13 movie rating system for content moderation on Instagram for users under 18.】

item.title: 法国呼叫中心 TP 因美国挑战而下调收入预期
item.description: 由于美国 "极不稳定的商业环境 "打击了其语言服务和招聘外包业务，TP 公司周二下调了全年收入和利润指导。【原文：TP slashed its full-year revenue and profit guidance on Tuesday, as a "highly volatile business environment" in the United States hit its language services and recruitment outsourcing businesses.】

item.title: 谈判陷入僵局，星巴克工会投票授权罢工
item.description: 星巴克工人联合组织周三宣布，星巴克咖啡师工会投票批准在星巴克客流量大的节假日前举行一次无限期罢工。【原文：Unionized Starbucks baristas voted to authorize an open-ended strike ahead of Starbucks' high-traffic holiday season, announced Starbucks Workers United on Wednesday.】

item.title: 庞巴迪Global 8000喷气机获得加拿大交通部认证
item.description: 庞巴迪公司周三表示，其环球8000公务机已获得加拿大运输监管机构的认证，有望成为协和式飞机之后速度最快的民用飞机。【原文：Bombardier said on Wednesday its Global 8000 business jet, expected to be the fastest civilian plane since the Concorde, has received a certification from Canada's transport regulator.】

item.title: 精神航空为扭亏为盈将裁员约 150 人
item.description: 精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines）周三表示，该公司将削减约 150 个受薪职位，并在 1 月前停止在密尔沃基和菲尼克斯等五个机场的服务，因为这家低成本航空公司希望扭亏为盈。【原文：Spirit Airlines said on Wednesday it would cut about 150 salaried roles, and discontinue service at five airports, including Milwaukee and Phoenix, by January as the low-cost carrier aims to turn itself around.】

item.title: 美联储主席米兰在接受雅虎财经采访时继续施压降息
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）周三重申，他认为目前的短期利率水平过于严格，正在给美国经济带来风险。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran reiterated on Wednesday that he believes the current level of short-term rates is too restrictive and is creating risks for the U.S. economy.】

item.title: 美国众议院议员调查达美航空公司在机票定价中使用人工智能的情况
item.description: 由二十多位美国众议院民主党议员组成的一个小组周三要求达美航空公司首席执行官埃德-巴斯蒂安（Ed Bastian）回答有关该公司是否会使用人工智能帮助制定机票价格的问题。【原文：A group of two dozen U.S. House Democratic lawmakers asked Delta Air Lines CEO Ed Bastian on Wednesday to answer questions about whether it will use generative artificial intelligence to help set ticket prices.】

item.title: 派拉蒙+（Paramount+）将与 PBR 签订为期五年的新协议，流媒体播放 PBR 的《释放野兽》（Unleash the Beast
item.description: Skydance 旗下的派拉蒙公司与美国职业斗牛士协会（Professional Bull Riders）周三表示，双方已签署一项为期五年的媒体版权协议，美国职业斗牛士协会的 "释放野兽"（Unleash the Beast）系列联赛将于 12 月开始在派拉蒙+ 频道播出。【原文：Skydance-owned Paramount and Professional Bull Riders have signed a five-year media rights agreement that would bring PBR's "Unleash the Beast" league series on Paramount+ starting in December, the companies said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司研究新产品，强调财务纪律
item.description: 巴西航空工业公司首席执行官弗朗西斯科-戈梅斯-内图（Francisco Gomes Neto）告诉路透社记者，该公司正在研究可以推动长期增长的新产品，但这些产品必须根据巴西飞机制造商的财务状况来考虑。【原文：Embraer is studying new products that could drive long-term growth, but these would have to be considered in light of the Brazilian planemaker's finances, CEO Francisco Gomes Neto told Reuters.】

item.title: 英格兰银行布里登敲响英美稳定币合作的战鼓
item.description: 英格兰银行副行长萨拉-布里登（Sarah Breeden）周三表示，美国和英国在稳定币监管方面保持同步 "非常重要"。【原文：The Bank of England deputy governor Sarah Breeden on Wednesday said it was ‘really important’ that the US and the UK are synchronised on stablecoin regulation.】

item.title: 美国银行财富管理部门新资产净值增长 4%-5
item.description: 美国银行高管周三表示，该行财富业务的中期目标是实现 4% 至 5% 的新资产净增长。【原文：Bank of America's wealth business is targeting 4% to 5% net new asset growth in the medium term, executives said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧盟与中国建立特殊渠道确保稀土供应，专员称
item.description: 欧盟贸易委员马罗斯-塞夫科维奇（Maros Sefcovic）周三表示，欧盟已与中国当局建立了 "特别沟通渠道"，以确保对欧盟工业至关重要的稀土材料的流通。【原文：The European Union has established a "special channel" of communication with Chinese authorities to secure the flow of rare earth materials vital for EU industries, EU Trade Commissioner Maros Sefcovic said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 纽约联储：第三季度美国家庭债务小幅增长
item.description: 纽约联储周三表示，由于某种形式的借贷问题趋于稳定，学生贷款问题加剧，第三季度美国家庭总体债务水平略有上升。【原文：Overall U.S. household debt levels increased modestly in the third quarter as borrowing in some form of trouble stabilized and student loan woes increased, the New York Federal Reserve said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 国泰航空以 8.973 亿美元回购卡塔尔航空股份
item.description: 香港旗舰航空公司国泰航空公司周三表示，将以 69.7 亿港元（8.9733 亿美元）的总代价回购卡塔尔航空公司持有的全部股份。【原文：Cathay Pacific Airways will repurchase all of its shares owned by Qatar Airways for a total consideration of HK$6.97 billion ($897.33 million), Hong Kong's flagship carrier said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 保险科技公司 Exzeo 在纽交所首秀表现平平，估值 19 亿美元
item.description: 保险技术公司 Exzeo Group 的股票周三在纽约证券交易所首次亮相时开盘持平，与保险行业强劲上市的趋势背道而驰，公司估值近 19.1 亿美元。【原文：Insurance technology firm Exzeo Group's shares opened flat in their New York Stock Exchange debut on Wednesday, bucking the trend of strong listings in the insurance sector and valuing the company at nearly $1.91 billion.】

item.title: 本田为下一代车型配备轻型平台，押宝混合动力汽车
item.description: 本田汽车周四表示，该公司正在开发一个以中型混合动力汽车为核心的平台和一个用于大型汽车的混合动力系统。【原文：Honda Motor said on Thursday it is developing a platform centred on mid-size hybrid cars and a hybrid system for large vehicles, as the Japanese automaker seeks to boost competitiveness amid a slower shift to fully electric cars.】

item.title: 美国 10 月份服务业活动加速；就业依然低迷
item.description: 10 月份，美国服务业活动在新订单稳健增长的带动下有所回升，但就业低迷表明，在进口关税带来的经济不确定性背景下，劳动力市场状况乏善可陈。【原文：U.S. services sector activity picked up in October amid a solid increase in new orders, but subdued employment pointed to lackluster labor market conditions against the backdrop of economic uncertainty stemming from tariffs on imports.】

item.title: 导航设备制造商 Trimble 上调年度预期，经常性收入创历史新高
item.description: Trimble 受益于其将导航设备与软件捆绑在一起用于建筑和运输等行业的战略，在周三超过季度预期后上调了年度盈利预期。【原文：Trimble raised its annual earnings forecast after surpassing quarterly estimates on Wednesday, benefitting from its strategy to bundle its navigation equipment with software for industries such as construction and transportation.】

item.title: 加航预计劳动力成本将增加，2026 年新飞机数量将创历史新高
item.description: 加拿大航空公司（Air Canada）的高管周三告诉分析师们，该公司计划在机队中增加 35 架新飞机，2026 年该公司将面临劳动力成本上升和美国休闲旅游低迷的困境。【原文：Air Canada is set to wrestle with higher labor costs and sluggish U.S. leisure travel in 2026, as the country's largest carrier plans to bring 35 new planes into its fleet, company executives told analysts on Wednesday.】

item.title: 加拿大 10 月份服务业采购经理人指数显示该行业今年首次出现扩张
item.description: S&P全球公司周三公布的加拿大服务业采购经理人指数（PMI）数据显示，由于企业显示出适应经济不确定性的迹象，加拿大服务业经济在10月份出现了11个月以来的首次扩张。【原文：Canada's services economy expanded in October for the first time in 11 months as businesses showed signs of adjusting to economic uncertainty, S&P Global's Canada services PMI data showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 莱昂纳多报告 9 个月订单、销售额和核心利润均实现两位数增长
item.description: 意大利航空航天与防务集团莱昂纳多（Leonardo）周三报告称，与2024年相比，今年前九个月的订单、收入和核心利润均实现了两位数的增长。【原文：Italy's aerospace and defence group Leonardo reported on Wednesday double-digit growth for orders, revenues and core profit in the first nine months of the year compared to 2024.】
